level.heading: Application for importation permit.
level.text: The application for issuance or renewal of a importation permit shall include:
The quantity, character, and brand or trade name of the alcoholic beverage to be transported; and
The name and address of the retailer.

level.heading: Legislative history of Law 13-298
level.text: For D.C. Law 13-298, see notes following § 25-101.
